nodes.text: Mister Ripper was the trained Skinflayer of Thades Gorkultok, a gladiator in the Arena Grand of Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Thades was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger" and was defeated in the sixth round of the Arena fights along with Mister Ripper.
Mister Ripper appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as part of the sixth boss fight of "Eternal Championship."
